trans-unit.source: A content snippet with the same name already exists. Please enter a different name.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同名稱的內容片段已經存在。請輸入不同的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A page template with the same name already exists. Please enter a different name.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同名稱的頁面範本已經存在。請輸入不同的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A webpage with the same name already exists. Please enter a different name.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同名稱的網頁已經存在。請輸入不同的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A webtemplate with the same name already exists. Please enter a different name.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同名稱的網頁範本已經存在。請輸入不同的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Active auth profile is not found or has expired. To create a new auth profile, enter the environment URL.
trans-unit.target: 找不到使用中驗證設定檔或該設定檔已經過期。若要建立新的驗證設定檔，請輸入環境 URL。

trans-unit.source: Add content snippet name (name should be unique)
trans-unit.target: 新增內容片段名稱 (名稱必須是唯一的)

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to clear all the Auth Profiles?
trans-unit.target: 確定要清除所有驗證設定檔嗎?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete the Auth Profile {0}-{1}?
trans-unit.note: {0} is the user name, {1} is the URL of environment of the auth profile
trans-unit.target: 確定要刪除驗證設定檔 {0}-{1} 嗎?

trans-unit.source: Authorization Failed. Please run again to authorize it
trans-unit.target: 授權失敗。請重新執行以進行授權

trans-unit.source: Be careful making changes. Anyone can see the changes you make immediately. Choose Edit the site to make edits, or close the editor tab to cancel without editing.
trans-unit.target: 進行變更時請務必小心，因為任何人都會立即看到您所做的變更。選擇 [編輯網站] 進行編輯，或關閉編輯器索引標籤以取消而不編輯。

trans-unit.note: {0} represents the error message returned from the exception
trans-unit.target: 無法安裝 Power Pages 產生器: {0}

trans-unit.note: {0} represents the error message returned from the exception

trans-unit.source: Check the URL and verify the parameters are correct
trans-unit.target: 檢查 URL 並確認參數正確無誤

trans-unit.note: The {0} represents profile's Azure Cloud Instances
{0} will be replaced by the entity type.

This is a multi-line tooltip The {0} represents Solution's Friendly / Display name The {1} represents Solution's unique name The {2} represents Solution's Version number The {3} represents Solution's Type (Managed or Unmanaged), but that test is localized separately.

trans-unit.source: Enter the name of the web template
trans-unit.target: 輸入 Web 範本的名稱

trans-unit.note: {0} will be replaced by the error message.

trans-unit.target: 無法停用 PAC 遙測。
無法啟用 PAC 遙測。

trans-unit.source: Failed to get file ready for edit.
trans-unit.target: 無法準備好文件進行編輯。

trans-unit.source: File might be referenced by name {0} here.
trans-unit.note: {0} represents the name of the file
trans-unit.target: 此處可能以名稱 {0} 參考檔案。

trans-unit.source: File(s) already exist. No new files to add
trans-unit.target: 檔案已經存在。沒有可新增的新檔案

trans-unit.source: Get help writing code in HTML, CSS, and JS languages for Power Pages sites with Copilot.
trans-unit.target: 獲得使用 Copilot 為 Power Pages 網站撰寫 HTML、CSS 和 JS 語言程式碼的協助。

trans-unit.note: {0} represents the version number
trans-unit.target: 正在安裝 Power Pages 產生器 (v{0})...
Microsoft 想知道您的意見反應
命名/重新命名驗證設定檔

trans-unit.note: The {0} represents the optional name the user provided for the profile)

This is a multi-line tooltip The {0} represents Dataverse Environment's Friendly / Display name The {1} represents Dataverse Environment's URL The {2} represents Dataverse Environment's Environment ID (GUID) The {3} represents Dataverse Environment's Organization ID (GUID)

trans-unit.source: No Website Data Found in Current Directory. Please switch to a directory that contains the PAC downloaded website data to continue.
trans-unit.target: 目前的目錄中找不到網站資料。請切換至包含 PAC 下載網站資料的目錄，以便繼續。

trans-unit.source: No parent pages found for adding webfile
trans-unit.target: 找不到可新增 Web 檔案的上層頁面

trans-unit.source: One or more attribute names have been changed or removed. Contact your admin.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個屬性名稱已變更或移除。請連絡您的管理員。

trans-unit.source: Page Template name cannot be empty.
trans-unit.target: 頁面範本名稱不可為空白。

trans-unit.source: Please enter a name for the content snippet.
trans-unit.target: 請輸入內容片段的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Please enter a name for the page template.
trans-unit.target: 請輸入頁面範本的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Please enter a name for the web template.
trans-unit.target: 請輸入 Web 範本的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Please enter a name for the webpage.
Power Pages Copilot is now connected to the environment: {0} : {1}
trans-unit.note: {0} represents the environment name
trans-unit.target: Power Pages Copilot 目前已連線到環境: {0} : {1}

trans-unit.note: {0} represents the version number
The {0} represents the profile type (Admin vs Dataverse)
The {0} represents profile's resource/environment URL

trans-unit.source: Select Folder for new PCF Control
trans-unit.note: Do not translate 'PCF' as it is a product name.
trans-unit.target: 為新的 PCF 控制項選取資料夾

trans-unit.target: 您已可在 VS Code 擴充功能中使用 Power Pages 產生器!

trans-unit.source: The name you want to give to this authentication profile
trans-unit.target: 您要為此驗證設定檔指定的名稱

trans-unit.source: The pac CLI is ready for use in your VS Code terminal!
trans-unit.target: 您已可在 VS Code 終端中使用 pac CLI!

There was a problem opening the workspace
trans-unit.target: 開啟工作區時發生問題

trans-unit.target: 試用 Power Pages 的 Copilot

trans-unit.note: The {0} represents auth profile's user name (email address))

trans-unit.source: We encountered an error preparing the file for edit.
trans-unit.target: 準備要編輯的檔案時發生錯誤。
已成功新增 Web 檔案

trans-unit.source: You are editing a live, public site
trans-unit.target: 您正在編輯已上線、公開的網站

trans-unit.source: dotnet sdk 6.0 or greater must be installed
trans-unit.note: Do not translate 'dotnet' or 'sdk'
trans-unit.target: 必須安裝 DotNet SDK 6.0 或更新版本

trans-unit.note: {0} will be replaced by the entity type.

trans-unit.source:
Avoid accidental overwrites when you try to save outdated code in VS Code for the Web. You can compare the changes side-by-side and decide to accept or revert the changes.
To learn more, visit [Prevent accidental overwrites](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.saveConflict-learn-more).
trans-unit.note: This is a Markdown formatted string, and the formatting must persist across translations. The fifth line should be '[TRANSLATION HERE](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.saveConflict-learn-more).', keeping brackets and the text in the parentheses unmodified
trans-unit.target:
當您嘗試在適用於 Web 的 VS Code 中儲存過時的程式碼時，應避免發生意外覆寫。您可以並排比較變更，然後決定要接受或還原變更。
若要深入了解，請造訪[避免意外覆寫](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.saveConflict-learn-more)。

trans-unit.source: Discover how you can make complete, modern websites right in Visual Studio Code
trans-unit.target: 了解如何在 Visual Studio Code 中製作完整的現代網站
編輯 Power Pages 代碼

trans-unit.source:
Find your page files organized in folders under your site name. All your pages are arranged into HTML, CSS, and JS files within the respective site component folders.
You can find site components like forms, content snippets, lists, and more to edit.
To learn more, visit [Power Pages file structure in VS Code](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.fileSystem-documentation).
[Visit site folder](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.fileSystem-open-folder)
trans-unit.note: This is a Markdown formatted string, and the formatting must persist across translations. The seventh line should be '[TRANSLATION HERE](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.fileSystem-documentation).', keeping brackets and the text in the parentheses unmodified The eighth line should be '[TRANSLATION HERE](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.fileSystem-open-folder)', keeping brackets and the text in the parentheses unmodified
trans-unit.target:
尋找整理在網站名稱下各個資料夾中的頁面檔案。您的所有頁面都以 HTML、CSS 和 JS 檔案排列在對應的網站元件資料夾中。
您可以尋找表單、內容片段、清單等網站元件並對其進行編輯。
若要深入了解，請造訪 [VS Code 中的 Power Pages 檔案結構](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.fileSystem-documentation)。
[造訪網站資料夾](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.fileSystem-open-folder)
命名/重新命名驗證設定檔

trans-unit.source: No auth profiles found on this computer. Interactive Authentication is not availalbe for remote scenarios; auth profiles must be created by the command line. The `--deviceCode` flow must be used for users with MFA requirements, or whose tenants use ADFS. [View Auth Profile Help](command:pacCLI.pacAuthHelp)
trans-unit.note: This is a Markdown formatted string, and the formatting must persist across translations. The second line should not translate the argument `--deviceCode` The third line should be '[TRANSLATION HERE](command:pacCLI.pacAuthHelp)', keeping brackets and the text in the parentheses unmodified
trans-unit.target: 在此電腦上找不到驗證設定檔。 互動式驗證不適用於遠端案例; 驗證設定檔必須由命令列建立。`--deviceCode` 流程必須針對有 MFA 需求或租用戶使用 ADFS 的使用者使用。 [檢視驗證設定檔說明](command:pacCLI.pacAuthHelp)

trans-unit.source: No auth profiles found on this computer. [Add Auth Profile](command:pacCLI.authPanel.newAuthProfile)
trans-unit.note: This is a Markdown formatted string, and the formatting must persist across translations. The second line should be '[TRANSLATION HERE](command:pacCLI.authPanel.newAuthProfile)', keeping brackets and the text in the parentheses unmodified
trans-unit.target: 在此電腦上找不到驗證設定檔。 [新增驗證設定檔](command:pacCLI.authPanel.newAuthProfile)

trans-unit.source:
Now easily edit code of your Power Pages site. Access code from supported site components like forms, content snippets, lists, and more from within Visual Studio Code.
To learn more, visit [Edit Power Pages code in VS Code](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.overview-learn-more).
trans-unit.note: This is a Markdown formatted string, and the formatting must persist across translations. The second line should be '[TRANSLATION HERE](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.overview-learn-more)', keeping brackets and the text in the parentheses unmodified
trans-unit.target:
現在，您可以輕鬆編輯 Power Pages 網站的程式碼。從 Visual Studio Code 中存取受支援的網站元件 (例如表單、內容片段、清單等) 中的程式碼。
若要深入了解，請造訪[在 VS Code 中編輯 Power Pages 程式碼](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.overview-learn-more)。

trans-unit.source: Overrides `#powerPlatform.auth.cloud#` for test targets. Leave blank for default behavior.
trans-unit.note: This is a Markdown formatted string, and `#powerPlatform.auth.cloud#` must remain unmodified.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫測試目標的 `#powerPlatform.auth.cloud#`。預設行為請保留空白。
PowerApps 入口網站 -> 顯示預覽
顯示 PAC 驗證説明
顯示 PAC PCF 說明
顯示 PAC 套件說明
顯示 PAC 解決方案說明

trans-unit.source:
Visual Studio Code for Web enables editing and publishing of web pages on your website.
For a command line interface and more advanced capabilities, install the Power Platform Extension for VS Code, available in the VS Code Marketplace for desktop.
[Learn More](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.advancedCapabilities-learn-more) about the difference between Visual Studio Code for desktop and web.
[Start coding](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.advancedCapabilities-start-coding)
trans-unit.note: This is a Markdown formatted string, and the formatting must persist across translations. The fifth line should be '[TRANSLATION HERE](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.advancedCapabilities-learn-more) TRANSLATION', keeping brackets and the text in the parentheses unmodified The seventh line should be '[TRANSLATION HERE](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.advancedCapabilities-start-coding)', keeping brackets and the text in the parentheses unmodified
trans-unit.target:
Visual Studio Code 網頁版讓您可以在您的網站上編輯和發佈網頁。
如需命令列介面和更進階的功能，請安裝適用於 VS Code 的 Power Platform 擴充功能，您可以從電腦版 VS Code 服務商場中取得。
[深入了解](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.advancedCapabilities-learn-more) 關於 Visual Studio Code 電腦版與網頁版之間的差異。
[開始撰寫程式碼](command:powerplatform-walkthrough.advancedCapabilities-start-coding)

trans-unit.source: Which Azure Cloud Power Platform Tools should use for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 應使用些 Azure 雲端 Power Platform Tools 來進行驗證。
